item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
CAFE ADULIS- this is a very cool ethnic experience. I highly recommend attending this HH!

A unique Ethiopian-Eritrean restaurant, Caffe Adulis is located on the periphery of the Yale Campus.
A recent review,
"The menu is small and specialized. This is a great place to go if some people in a group just want drinks, others want dessert, and someone hasn't had dinner yet."

SPECIALS:
Finger foods including,
hummus wraps
Beef and Veggie Skewers
Other Eritrean delights

DRINK SPECIALS:
5.00$ Mojitos and house Martinis
6.00$ House Red and White Wine



Contact info
Liz F. 203 415.2066
item.name: Happy Hour @ Cafe Adulis
